column4: did you ever unmute your microphone? it was muted in one of the pictures you posted a while ago
the reason for that being muted in the first place was it wasn't the audio tab so I didn't know if that may have been interfering.
have you checked out the input tab of pavucontrol?
oddly enough, if I tap on this thing: http://i.imgur.com/kKMq6.jpg  the input bar goes up and down as if I were talking into the mic.
strange, so it would seem that pulseaudio seems to see it, is it selected in System/Preferences/Sound on the input tab?
and if so, can you record anything with the Sound Recorder?
no, that's where I've been trying, if I record sound and try to listen back it's just blank.
I've also been trying the skype test call, but that comes back blank also
oh I see, it is moving, but it should be moving much more than that, which is probably why it isn't recording anything
that's only when I tap on the little control thing
it doesn't move at all when I speak
that's my point, for some reason the volume is very low (although you have it on max so I don't understand that), when I tap mine, almost the whole meter fills up
it's as if it thinks the microphone is in the control part of the headset rather than in the actual microphone.
